answers.answer: You may have some variant of dysautonomia, a dysregulation of your autonomic nervous system.  .Look also into a possible link with the  pituitary and the pineal glands,  which regulate our hormones and influence the hypothalamic-pituitary-hormonal axis.This is not an easy diagnosis and with only the details in your post, I cannot offer any more precise comments.If your doctors cannot offer any answers, my advice would be to seek a NAET  (Nambudripad's Allergy Elimination Techniques) trained Doctor or Practitioner.Best wishes,Niko

Hello~Have you had any blood work done to rule out diabetes? Some folks that are in the beginning stages of it can have these symptoms. I would see your doctor and ask for a complete blood panel work up.
